amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that a commission be established to review the efficiency of Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 282 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 282 proposed by Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S4063-4071; text: CR S4071) To express the sense of the Senate that a commission be established to review the efficiency of Federal agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 282 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 282 proposed by Senator Brownback.
